fields.name: u3pr7ujci4
fields.label: Unlink Payment on Cancellation of Invoice

fields.name: u3p49f186m
fields.label: Unlink Advance Payment on Cancellation of Order

fields.name: u3po5d3blj
fields.label: Delete Accounting and Stock Ledger Entries on deletion of Transaction

fields.name: u3plb8qtc8
fields.label: Enable Immutable Ledger
fields.description: On enabling this cancellation entries will be posted on the actual cancellation date and reports will consider cancelled entries as well

fields.name: u3pebi3kcq
fields.label: Check Supplier Invoice Number Uniqueness
fields.description: Enabling this ensures each Purchase Invoice has a unique value in Supplier Invoice No. field within a particular fiscal year

fields.name: u3p3i32as5
fields.label: Automatically Fetch Payment Terms from Order
fields.description: Payment Terms from orders will be fetched into the invoices as is

fields.name: u3pcd168i4
fields.label: Enable Common Party Accounting
fields.description: Learn about Common Party

fields.name: u3p0ruukkm
fields.label: Allow multi-currency invoices against single party account
fields.description: Enabling this will allow creation of multi-currency invoices against single party account in company currency

fields.name: u3prtiafvg
fields.label: Confirm before resetting posting date
fields.description: If enabled, user will be alerted before resetting posting date to current date in relevant transactions

fields.name: u3pdvekb01
fields.label: Merge Similar Account Heads
fields.description: Rows with Same Account heads will be merged on Ledger

fields.name: u3pva708ak
fields.label: Book Deferred Entries Based On
fields.description: If "Months" is selected, a fixed amount will be booked as deferred revenue or expense for each month irrespective of the number of days in a month. It will be prorated if deferred revenue or expense is not booked for an entire month

fields.name: u3plvn1f25
fields.label: Book Deferred Entries Via Journal Entry
fields.description: If this is unchecked, direct GL entries will be created to book deferred revenue or expense

fields.name: u3p7rsfshm
fields.label: Submit Journal Entries
fields.description: If this is unchecked Journal Entries will be saved in a Draft state and will have to be submitted manually

fields.name: u3pr123h4c
fields.label: Determine Address Tax Category From
fields.description: Address used to determine Tax Category in transactions

fields.name: u3piktsd1s
fields.label: Automatically Add Taxes and Charges from Item Tax Template

fields.name: u3pls4vlnt
fields.label: Automatically Add Taxes from Taxes and Charges Template
fields.description: If no taxes are set, and Taxes and Charges Template is selected, the system will automatically apply the taxes from the chosen template.

fields.name: u3pdkdc95s
fields.label: Book Tax Loss on Early Payment Discount
fields.description: Split Early Payment Discount Loss into Income and Tax Loss

fields.name: u3pp6r5au2
fields.label: Round Tax Amount Row-wise
fields.description: Tax Amount will be rounded on a row(items) level

fields.name: u3pc2jj517
fields.label: Show Taxes as Table in Print

fields.name: u3p0cvm97l
fields.label: Maintain Same Rate Throughout Internal Transaction

fields.name: u3pcppt7te
fields.label: Fetch Valuation Rate for Internal Transaction

fields.name: u3p6dufv2v
fields.label: Action if Same Rate is Not Maintained Throughout  Internal Transaction

fields.name: u3pu09djek
fields.label: Role Allowed to Override Stop Action

fields.name: u3p9jnr7mo
fields.label: Allow Implicit Pegged Currency Conversion
fields.description:
System will do an implicit conversion using the pegged currency.
Ex: Instead of AED -> INR, system will do AED -> USD -> INR using the pegged exchange rate of AED against USD.

fields.name: u3phuolghl
fields.label: Auto Reconciliation Job Trigger
fields.description: Interval should be between 1 to 59 MInutes

fields.name: u3pugkugl9
fields.label: Reconciliation Queue Size
fields.description: Documents Processed on each trigger. Queue Size should be between 5 and 100

fields.name: u3p489h9hs
fields.label: Posting Date Inheritance for Exchange Gain / Loss
fields.description: Only applies for Normal Payments

fields.name: u3pvh340ri
fields.label: Over Billing Allowance (%)
fields.description: The percentage you are allowed to bill more against the amount ordered. For example, if the order value is $100 for an item and tolerance is set as 10%, then you are allowed to bill up to $110

fields.name: u3pk8a2d2o
fields.label: Role Allowed to Over Bill
fields.description: Users with this role are allowed to over bill above the allowance percentage

fields.name: u3pimalei7
fields.label: Role allowed to bypass Credit Limit

fields.name: u3p6qu12ts
fields.label: Create Ledger Entries for Change Amount
fields.description: If enabled, ledger entries will be posted for change amount in POS transactions

fields.name: u3pg02dc29
fields.label: Calculate daily depreciation using total days in depreciation period
fields.description: Enable this option to calculate daily depreciation by considering the total number of days in the entire depreciation period, (including leap years) while using daily pro-rata based depreciation

fields.name: u3phf4662o
fields.label: Accounts Frozen Till Date
fields.description: Accounting entries are frozen up to this date. Nobody can create or modify entries except users with the role specified below

fields.name: u3p3vb1u21
fields.label: Ignore Account Closing Balance
fields.description: Financial reports will be generated using GL Entry doctypes (should be enabled if Period Closing Voucher is not posted for all years sequentially or missing)

fields.name: u3pjnqfe26
fields.label: Role Allowed to Set Frozen Accounts and Edit Frozen Entries
fields.description: Users with this role are allowed to set frozen accounts and create / modify accounting entries against frozen accounts

fields.name: u3p034a5go
fields.label: Show Balances in Chart Of Accounts

fields.name: u3pl2m4kb8
fields.label: Enable Automatic Party Matching
fields.description: Auto match and set the Party in Bank Transactions

fields.name: u3phtu411d
fields.label: Enable Fuzzy Matching
fields.description: Approximately match the description/party name against parties

fields.name: u3phpr5qhm
fields.label: General Ledger
fields.description: Truncates 'Remarks' column to set character length

fields.name: u3pe1qp8s1
fields.label: Accounts Receivable/Payable
fields.description: Truncates 'Remarks' column to set character length

fields.name: u3p217u35a
fields.label: Data Fetch Method
fields.options:
Buffered Cursor
UnBuffered Cursor
Raw SQL

fields.name: u3pb61tl0o
fields.label: Drop Procedures
fields.description: Drops existing SQL Procedures and Function setup by Accounts Receivable report

fields.name: u3pce51dg8
fields.label: Ignore Is Opening check for reporting
fields.description: Ignores legacy Is Opening field in GL Entry that allows adding opening balance post the system is in use while generating reports

fields.name: u3p4nv21tr
fields.label: Payment Request
fields.description: Payment Request created from Sales Order or Purchase Order will be in Draft status. When disabled document will be in unsaved state.
